projects.title: PhysioLens - Capstone Project
projects.description:
PhysioLens is a desktop application that provides physiotherapists with real-time biomechanical analysis of patients performing rehabilitation exercises, without requiring physical motion trackers. It uses markerless pose estimation to extract joint angles and kinematic data, visualized through a live camera overlay and web portal.
This is being completed as a apart of my Capstone project for school in a group of 4.

projects.title: Shopify Website Design

Designing and creating a Shopify website for a local business. Managing communication with client, gathering requirements, and mock-up design work. The website will be a landing page, event registration, and e-commerce platform all in one.
This is a work in progress with a delivery expected by March 2026.

projects.title: Weather Forecast App
projects.description: Full-stack weather application with user authentication, real-time forecasts, and admin controls. Features JWT authentication, secure password hashing, and Entity Framework for database management.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: The website you are currently viewing! Built in plain HTML, and JS to prove to my self I can still build a website without a framework. I also used Tailwind CSS to speed up the styling process and make it look nice. I also tried to mimic my own SPA, component based architecture to make it easier to maintain and add new features in the future.
